title:
I heard that 5 bar/ bar restaurants were sited Thursday evening in Carolina Beach for serving under age people. Is this true?  I heard two of these bars are brand new with temporary liscences.  So what happends to a bar that has a temp liscence and they are found in violation. 

The bar/restaurants include

The Dive

Havannas

Cobbs Corner *** new

Tangerines

Hop Lite ***new
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100712/ARTICLES/100719943/1177?Title=Four-Carolina-Beach-bars-charged
